Verses: 1 medhuvaana Pradhiyuththaram Ukkiraththai Maatrum; Kadunchorkalo Kobaththai Ezhuppum.
2 gnaanigalin Naavu Arivai Ubayogappaduththum; Moodarin Vaayo Buththiyeenaththaik Kakkum.
3 karththarin Kangal Evvidaththilumirundhu, Nalloraiyum Theeyoraiyum Nokkippaarkkiradhu.
4 aarokkiyamulla Naavu Jeevavirutcham; Naavin Maarupaado Aaviyai Norukkum.
5 moodan Than Thagappan Buththiyai Alatchiyampannugiraan; Kadindhukolludhalaik Gavaniththu Nadakkiravano Vivegi.
6 needhimaanudaiya Veettil Adhiga Pokkishamundu; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Varumaanaththilo Thunbamundu.
7 gnaanigalin Udhadugal Arivai Iraikkum; Moodarin Irudhayamo Appadiyalla.
8 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Bali Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanadhu; Semmaiyaanavargalin Jebamo Avarukkup Piriyam.
9 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vazhi Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanadhu; Needhiyaip Pinpatrugiravanaiyo Avar Nesikkiraar.
10 vazhiyai Vittu Vilagugiravanukku Buththimadhi Visanamaayirukkum; Kadindhukolludhalai Verukkiravan Saavaan.
11 paadhaalamum Azhivum Karththarin Paarvaikkup Praththiyatchamaayirukka, Manupuththirarudaiya Irudhayam Adhiga Praththiyatchamaayirukkumallavo?
12 pariyaasakkaaran Thannaik Kadindhukollugiravanai Nesiyaan; Gnaanavaangalidaththil Pogavumaattaan.
13 manamagizhchchi Mugamalarchchiyaith Tharum; Manodhukkaththinaale Aavi Murindhupom.
14 buththimaanudaiya Manam Arivaith Thedum; Moodarin Vaayo Madhiyeenaththai Meyum.
15 sirumaippattavanudaiya Naatkalellaam Theengullavaigal; Manarammiyamo Niththiya Virundhu.
16 sanjalaththodu Koodiya Adhigapporulilum, Karththaraip Patrum Bayaththodu Koodiya Konjapporule Uththamam.
17 pagaiyodirukkum Kozhuththa Erudhin Kariyaippaarkkilum, Snegaththodirukkum Ilaikkariye Nalladhu.
18 kobakkaaran Sandaiyai Ezhuppugiraan; Neediya Saandhamullavano Sandaiyai Amarththugiraan.
19 somberiyin Vazhi Mulvelikku Samaanam; Needhimaanudaiya Vazhiyo Raajapaadhai.
20 gnaanamulla Magan Thagappanai Sandhoshappaduththugiraan; Madhiyatra Manushano Than Thaayai Alatchiyampannugiraan.
21 moodaththanam Buththiyeenanukku Sandhosham; Buththimaano Than Nadakkaiyai Semmaippaduththugiraan.
22 aalosanaiyillaamaiyaal Ennangal Siththiyaamarpom; Aalosanaikkaarar Anegar Irundhaal Avaigal Urudhippadum.
23 manushanukkuth Than Vaaimozhiyinaal Magizhchchiyundaagum; Etra Kaalaththil Sonna Vaarththai Evvalavu Nalladhu!
24 keezhaana Paadhaalaththai Vittu Vilagumpadi, Vivegikku Jeevavazhiyaanadhu Unnadhaththai Nokkum Vazhiyaam.
25 agangaariyin Veettaik Karththar Pidungippoduvaar; Vidhavaiyin Ellaiyaiyo Nilaippaduththuvaar.
26 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Ninaivugal Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal; Suththavaangaludaiya Vaarththaigalo Inbamaanavaigal.
27 porulaasaikkaaran Than Veettaik Kalaikkiraan; Paridhaanangalai Verukkiravano Pizhaippaan.
28 needhimaanudaiya Manam Pradhiyuththaram Solla Yosikkum; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vaayo Theemaigalaik Koppalikkum.
29 dhunmaarkkarukkuk Karththar Dhooramaayirukkiraar; Needhimaangalin Jebaththaiyo Ketkiraar.
30 kangalin Oli Irudhayaththaip Poorippaakkum; Narseydhi Elumbugalaip Pushtiyaakkum.
31 jeevanukkedhuvaana Kadindhukolludhalai Etrukkollum Kaadhu Gnaanigalidaththe Thangum.
32 buththimadhiyaith Thallividugiravan Than Aaththumaavai Verukkiraan; Kadindhukolludhalaik Ketkiravano Gnaanamadaivaan.
33 karththarukku Bayappadudhal Gnaanaththaip Podhikkum; Menmaikku Munnaanadhu Thaazhmai.
